name: Oh ship, here we go again
name_original: Oh ship, here we go again
description:
Oh ship here we go again!

 

TheGodFatherJam is back ! 4 days to create a game draft using discord with our teammates ! This year, Game Artists, Game Designers, Game Programmers and Producers gathered around famous quotes from movies which inspired their games.

No quote could have been more thrilling than the tensed sentence: “Houston, we have a problem” from the movie Apollo 13 !

Pitch:

Exploration is always filled up with unknown. And when we think about space, unknown often refers to an Alien that expresses his hospitality by laying an egg in your stomach. But with Apollo 13, the only thing that wants you dead is your ship. Indeed, a technical error is all it takes to send you crashing into an asteroid. The error you get ? Unknown. When will it get repaired? Unknown. Can you still navigate through those asteroids ? I hope for you that you can!

With each crash your ship gets damaged, making it more difficult to maneuver. Adapt is your only solution in this endless runner that pulls you out of your comfort zone.   

You can’t avoid damages on your ship so you’d better be ready for it. Knowing the issue that can occur to you is the first preparation step:

Horizontal reverse command : Left becomes right and right becomes left.
